languages.text: Богохульное творение гемункула по имени Хтонос сбежало от своего жуткого творца. Это биомеханическое чудовище укрылось в Увечном секторе, где охотится на несчастных жертв.
The Haemonculus's profane creation known as the Chtonos has escaped from its maker. This biomechanical abomination now stalks the Mangled Sector, preying on unfortunate victims.
languages.original_text: Богохульное творение гемункула по имени Хтонос сбежало от своего жуткого творца. Это биомеханическое чудовище укрылось в Увечном секторе, где охотится на несчастных жертв.

traits.locale_text: Haemonculus's profane creation called Chtonos has escaped its maker. This biomechanical abomination is lurking in the Forbidden Sector, hunting its unfortunate victims.
The Haemonculus's profane creation known as the Chtonos has escaped from its maker. This biomechanical abomination now stalks the Mangled Sector, preying on unfortunate victims.
The Haemonculus's profane creation known as the Chtonos has escaped from its maker. This biomechanical abomination now stalks the Mangled Sector, preying on unfortunate victims.

languages.text: Le Chtonos, la création profane de l'hémoncule, a échappé à son créateur. L'abomination biomécanique rôde maintenant dans le Secteur condamné et attaque d'innocences victimes.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's profane creation known as the Chtonos has escaped from its maker. This biomechanical abomination now stalks the Mangled Sector, preying on unfortunate victims.

traits.locale_text: Le Chtonos, la création profane de l'hémoncule, a échappé à son créateur. L'abomination biomécanique rôde maintenant dans le Secteur condamné et attaque d'innocences victimes.

languages.text: 血伶人的邪恶造物“奇托诺斯”从实验室里逃了出去。这只怪物此刻正在崩落区四处游荡，捕食不幸的受害者。
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's profane creation known as the Chtonos has escaped from its maker. This biomechanical abomination now stalks the Mangled Sector, preying on unfortunate victims.

traits.locale_text: 血伶人的邪恶造物“奇托诺斯”从实验室里逃了出去。这只怪物此刻正在崩落区四处游荡，捕食不幸的受害者。

languages.text: ハモンキュラスによる不敬な創造物、チャトノスがその創造主から逃げ出した。このバイオメカニカルな忌まわしき者が現在、切り裂かれた星域を闊歩し、不幸な犠牲者を蹂躙している。
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's profane creation known as the Chtonos has escaped from its maker. This biomechanical abomination now stalks the Mangled Sector, preying on unfortunate victims.

traits.locale_text: ハモンキュラスによる不敬な創造物、チャトノスがその創造主から逃げ出した。このバイオメカニカルな忌まわしき者が現在、切り裂かれた星域を闊歩し、不幸な犠牲者を蹂躙している。

languages.text: Die profane Schöpfung des Haemonculus, der so genannte Chtonos, ist seinem Schöpfer entwischt. Diese biomechanische Abscheulichkeit macht nun im Zerfleischten Sektor Jagd auf unglückselige Opfer.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's profane creation known as the Chtonos has escaped from its maker. This biomechanical abomination now stalks the Mangled Sector, preying on unfortunate victims.

traits.locale_text: Die profane Schöpfung des Haemonculus, der so genannte Chtonos, ist seinem Schöpfer entwischt. Diese biomechanische Abscheulichkeit macht nun im Zerfleischten Sektor Jagd auf unglückselige Opfer.

languages.text: La blasfema creación del Hemónculo, el Chtonos, ha escapado a su creador. Este engendro biomecánico ahora acecha en el Sector Destrozado, atacando a sus pobres víctimas.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's profane creation known as the Chtonos has escaped from its maker. This biomechanical abomination now stalks the Mangled Sector, preying on unfortunate victims.

traits.locale_text: La blasfema creación del Hemónculo, el Chtonos, ha escapado a su creador. Este engendro biomecánico ahora acecha en el Sector Destrozado, atacando a sus pobres víctimas.
